title: Physics Nobel Prize awards Alain Aspect, pioneer of the 'second quantum revolution'
description: The Frenchman was honored jointly with the American John Clauser and the Austrian Anton Zeilinger for the discovery of particle entanglement, opening the way to applications in quantum information.

title: Nobel Prize in physics shared by French, Austrian and American trio working on quantum science
description: The scientific trio were awarded the world-famous prize for "pioneering quantum information science."
